attributes.action: Rejoin the European Union as soon as possible as a full member
attributes.additional_details:
Of 462 polls since July 2017 asking if Brexit was right or wrong or if we would now vote Remain or Leave, 431 back Remain (with just 10 for Leave and 21 tied).

A further 159 polls since Nov 2021 show 155 backing Rejoin the EU with only 4 for Staying out.

No poll since May 2022 has supported Leaving/Staying out. All 244 polls since then have been in favour of Remain/Rejoin with a lead of up to 29% and a recent average of 19%.

Democracy means the right to change your mind. It is time to Rejoin.
attributes.background:
The UK public believes that Brexit has not brought the country any tangible benefits and there are no prospects of any in the future.

Over 620 polls since 2017 give concrete evidence that the public:
- believes that in hindsight it was wrong to vote to leave, and
- now wants to Rejoin the EU.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644973
